column5: If you'd like to stay in a newly built neighborhood and home, with 800 sq. ft. to yourself in South Austin, my spare room is perfect for you!  In addition to a comfortable queen-sized bed and private bathroom, you'll also get private use of our loft entertainment room, complete with Apple TV, Hulu, HBO Go, Netflix, our new speaker system, desk work area and 2 Lazy Boy reclining sofas.   There is safe, designated visitor parking in front of my home.
column8: Modern Home- Private 2nd Floor, 7 mi. to Downtown
